channel.title: mycatalog updates
channel.description: 'My Catalog' uses the IBM Cloud catalog API to retrieve data from the catalog. It attempts to be as accurate as possible. This feed shows additions, updates, removals from the catalog. Use with care. It is a work-in-progress :)

item.title: [updated] ConvertIO Workload Migration and Conversion (convertio) has a new plan named vmware-to-red-hat-edition-for-vpc-bare-metal
item.description: Quantity of “managed service units” determined from initial no-cost project scoping conducted by PrimaryIO professional services.
